org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

team_slug.description: The slug of the team name.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

permission.description: The permission to grant the team on this repository. We accept the following permissions to be set: `pull`, `triage`, `push`, `maintain`, `admin` and you can also specify a custom repository role name, if the owning organization has defined any. If no permission is specified, the team's `permission` attribute will be used to determine what permission to grant the team on this repository.
